title: Mystery Gift
body:
I just got a mystery gift today which I accidentally clicked off and I have looked at a bunch of forums which say you get an icon and a skin. I have checked my purchase history and it says that I was only gifted an icon. I do not own the Riot Kayle skin which is one that I checked for due to it being on the forums and I have never owned it. I was just wondering if it had been changed so you only get an icon or a skin or that maybe the skin does not come up in the purchase history and I would have to search for it. I am not very good at tone in posts so if it seems like I am anything other than questioning and happy that was not my intention.

From a loyal league player,

Apocalypseange1

replies.body: It looks like you received the Snow Day Scuttler Icon and the Poro King Icon! Mystery solved! :)
